(long long)__d.__getval(); } 118 119 // ISO/IEC TR 24733 3.2.5 Initialization from coefficient and exponent. 120 121 static decimal32 make_decimal32(long long __coeff, int __exponent) 122 { 123 decimal32 __decexp = 1, __multiplier; 124 125 if (__exponent < 0) 126 { 127 __multiplier = 1.E-1DF; 128 __exponent = -__exponent; 129 } 130 else 131 __multiplier = 1.E1DF; 132 133 for (int __i = 0; __i < __exponent; ++__i) 134 __decexp *= __multiplier; 135 136 return __coeff * __decexp; 137 } 138 139 static decimal32 make_decimal32(unsigned long long __coeff, int __exponent) 140 { 141 decimal32 __decexp = 1, __multiplier; 142 143 if (__exponent < 0) 144 { 145 __multiplier = 1.E-1DF; 146 __exponent = -__exponent; 147 } 148 else 149 __multiplier = 1.E1DF; 150 151 for (int __i = 0; __i <
